problem.display_name: Mathematical criteria satisfied by density matrices
problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous video clip.
Which of the following mathematical criteria must be satisfied for a matrix [mathjaxinline]\rho[/mathjaxinline] to be a density matrix?

choice.text: [mathjaxinline]\rho[/mathjaxinline] may have complex eignvalues, but they must have unit magnitude
[mathjaxinline]\rho[/mathjaxinline] cannot have eigenvalues equal to zero
The sum of the eigenvalues of [mathjaxinline]\rho[/mathjaxinline] must equal one
